other_tests.findings: Paucity of ADAM17 expression in skin from the affected boy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Marked reduction of ADAM17 expression in skin and small intestine over time.

other_tests.procedure_name: Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells (PBMCs) Cytokine Production Test
other_tests.findings: High levels of lipopolysaccharide-induced production of interleukin-1β and interleukin-6 but impaired release of TNF-α.
Reduced expression of ADAM17 in small intestine of affected children.
Absence of ADAM17 expression in cells from the affected boy.
